code: var validators=function validators(target,value){var result=false;switch(target){case"name":value.length<45?result=true:result=false;var regex=/^[a-zA-ZñÑáéíóúÁÉÍÓÚ\s]*$/;if(regex.test(value))result=true;else if(value.length===0)result=true;break;case"dni":if(!isNaN(value)&&value.length<=8)result=true;else result=false;if(value.length===0)result=true;break;case"phone":if(!isNaN(value)&&value.length<=9)result=true;else result=false;if(value.length===0)result=true;break;case"email":if(value.length<=64)result=true;else result=false;break;case"instructions":value.length<150?result=true:result=false;break;case"address":value.length<25?result=true:result=false;break;default:break;}return result;};var validatorsLevel2=function validatorsLevel2(setErrorsForm,currentForm){var errors={};for(var prop in currentForm){switch(prop){case"name":if(currentForm[prop].length>45||currentForm[prop]==="")errors[prop]=true;var regex=/^\S+(?:[\s]+\S+)+$/;if(!regex.test(currentForm[prop]))errors[prop]=true;break;case"dni":if(isNaN(currentForm[prop])||currentForm[prop].length!==8)errors[prop]=true;break;case"phone":if(isNaN(currentForm[prop])||currentForm[prop].length!==9)errors[prop]=true;break;case"email":var expresionRegular=/\S+@\S+\.\S+/;if(!expresionRegular.test(currentForm[prop]))errors[prop]=true;break;case"instructions":if(currentForm[prop].length>150)errors[prop]=true;break;case"address":if(currentForm.ciudad.toLowerCase()==="trujillo"){if(currentForm[prop]==="")errors[prop]=true;};break;case"departamento":if(currentForm[prop].toLowerCase()==="selecciona tu departamento"||currentForm[prop]==="")errors[prop]=true;break;case"ciudad":if(currentForm[prop].toLowerCase()==="selecciona tu ciudad"||currentForm[prop]==="")errors[prop]=true;break;default:break;}}setErrorsForm(errors);return errors;};export{validators,validatorsLevel2};
